title: Bandelier National Monument: Science & Research
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Science & Research             Science & Research         Researcher doing a plant survey line   Bandelier is home of several ongoing and intermittent research projects. we will highlight those here and let you know how you can get involved. Saturday, July 25 at 9am, meeting at the Burnt Mesa trailhead for the "Dorothy Hoard Memorial Butterfly Count."  The first session will last until 10:45, then the group will move to Camp May from 11:15 until 12:45 and head on to Ca√±;on from 1:45 until 3:15. You are welcome to attend any or all of these sessions. Registration is required for the count on their Valle at peecnature.org (Kids are free; adults are $5). If you are interested, bring binoculars, cameras, nets (if you have one), lunch, water, and sturdy walking shoes.
